description:
Mikoi: Mesmerizes with its beautiful scales in sea minor. Their Heirloom, Glam Microphone, lets you overcharge your reflect action to perform a resonance blast, but also damages the ship.

Noh: Has whiskers as pointed as a cat-ana! Their Heirloom, Black Belt, lets you overcharge your reflect action to perform a flash step.
name: Ship of Fools - Water Garden Duo
